vendors.name: INIT Innovations in Transportation, Inc.
vendors.description: Leading provider of integrated ITS solutions including CAD/AVL, real-time passenger information, fare collection systems, and electric bus management solutions globally.

vendors.name: Trapeze Group (Volaris)
vendors.description: Provider of transit management software including CAD/AVL, passenger information, scheduling, and mobility management solutions.

vendors.name: Apollo Video Technology (Luminator Transit Division)
vendors.description: Specializes in mobile video surveillance systems for transit, known for RoadRunner DVR and ViM software, enhancing security and fleet management.

vendors.name: Rosco Vision Systems
vendors.description: Manufacturer of automotive vision safety products, including camera-based collision avoidance and pedestrian safety systems for buses.

vendors.name: Mobileye (Intel Company)
vendors.description: Global leader in advanced driver-assistance systems, particularly camera and AI-based collision avoidance technologies.

vendors.name: LECIP Inc.
vendors.description: LECIP Inc. is the U.S. subsidiary of LECIP Holdings Corporation, providing automated fare collection systems, LED lighting, and passenger information systems.

vendors.name: Luminator Technology Group
vendors.description: Manufacturer of destination signage, infotainment screens, and passenger communication systems for transit vehicles.

vendors.name: Tait Communications
vendors.description: Provider of mission-critical digital radio communication solutions tailored for public safety and transportation.

vendors.name: New Flyer Industries (NFI Group)
vendors.description: North America's largest transit bus manufacturer offering battery-electric and fuel cell-electric mobility solutions.

vendors.name: Gillig Corporation
vendors.description: Second-largest transit bus provider in North America offering heavy-duty battery electric, hybrid, and clean diesel buses.

vendors.name: BYD/RIDE Mobility
vendors.description: Global pioneer in electric bus manufacturing specializing in battery and zero-emission vehicle technologies.

vendors.name: Right Systems! Inc
vendors.description: Provider of IT solutions and consulting services, specializing in infrastructure, networking, cybersecurity, and managed services.

vendors.name: IQGeo
vendors.description: Provider of geospatial software solutions designed for managing network assets and optimizing field operations for utilities and telecom companies.
